department.ch: 學習與教學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程為碩博班層級的認知心理學課程，著重於認知心理學在教育上的重要研究議題及發現。在課程之中，老師會帶同學一同閱讀認知心理學在教育方面現有研究成果，其中包含理論、研究方法及研究發現。同時，老師期望同學能夠在章節閱讀上提出你的觀點及批判。修課同學需要先深思熟慮及做好心理準備：每週花大量時間閱讀、摘要及心得。課程預計讓同學了解認知心理學的研究成果，以及如何運用於教育領域；而在教育領域內的研究，如何回饋到認知心理學的理論上。修課同學應先修習過大學部普通心理學、實驗研究法及認知心理學等課程為佳。若修課同學無相關背景知識，請先自行閱讀參考教科書。
goal.en: This course is a master‘s and doctoral level cognitive psychology course that focuses on important research topics and findings in cognitive psychology in education. During the course, the instructor will guide students to read existing research results in cognitive psychology in education, including theories, research methods, and findings. Students are expected to present their perspectives and critiques on the readings. Students need to be well-prepared and mentally ready to spend a significant amount of time reading, summarizing, and reflecting each week. The course aims to help students understand the research findings in cognitive psychology and how to apply them in the field of education; and how research in the field of education can feedback into cognitive psychology theories. Students are expected to have taken undergraduate courses in general psychology, experimental research methods, and cognitive psychology. If students do not have the relevant background knowledge, they should read the reference textbooks on their own.

gradMethod.ch: 評量成績方式： 課堂導讀與討論30％  章節整理與心得40％  期末報告30％
gradMethod.en:
Class presentation and discussion: 30％
Chapter summaries and reflections: 40％
Final report: 30％

flexDiscription.ch: 最後兩週讓同學專注於完成研究計畫的期末報告。在最後兩週之課程時段，教師將會以線上討論形式，回答學生在撰寫上的問題。
flexDiscription.en: The final two weeks are dedicated to allowing students to focus on completing their final research project reports. During these weeks, the instructor will hold online discussion sessions to address any questions students may have while writing.
